name: Welcome to Orochi Park
detailed_description:
An interactive fiction adventure-strategy parody. Send agents on missions, build your base, research superweapons and buy units. Along the way, unlock occult mysteries. Plus romance Kelly from Mass Effect. You can play the demo for free. The full game releases late 2018.

Important demo notes: There are a couple of bugs due to the full game still being a year off. First, you may get an error trying to install the demo as Steam is saying "Can't install full version yet". Just keep pressing "yes" and the demo will install. Second, the game does not yet scale to laptop monitors, only 1920px and 2560px. I will fix this by Christmas.

Key Features


  • A parody of Mass Effect and The Secret World
  • Deep adventure-strategy gameplay
  • Detailed interactive fiction

A Parody of Mass Effect and The Secret World


Command a troupe of movie cosplayers with a collective IQ of 100. Romance Kelly from Mass Effect. Resist the urge to buy Conan Exiles.

Deep Adventure-Strategy Gameplay


Every turn, send agents to gather weapons and forge alliances. Set strategic priorities in the doomsday bunker in five locations - the War Room, the Armoury, the Barracks, the Library and the Black Market.

Detailed Interactive Fiction


Welcome to Orochi Park features detailed art and a compelling story that's fully voice acted. Hundreds of strategic choices lead to 20 different color-coded endings.

short_description: An interactive fiction adventure-strategy parody. Send agents on missions, build your base, research superweapons and buy units. Along the way, unlock occult mysteries. Plus romance Kelly from Mass Effect. You can play the demo for free. The full game releases late 2018.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The demo only works so far on 1920px and 2560px monitors. Support for other resolutions is incoming.

legal_notice: Uses only original assets. All parody references meet requirements for fair use under US law.
